ca.utoronto.msrg.padres.broker.brokercore
Class BrokerConfig

java.lang.Object
  ca.utoronto.msrg.padres.broker.brokercore.BrokerConfig

public class BrokerConfig
extends Object

The data structure to process broker configuration files and command line options and store the broker configurations.

Author:
Bala Maniymaran Created: 2011-02-02
